title: Transparency Is Fundamental In the CBD Space With Marshall Getto
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Marshall Getto is CEO of Freed Technology, a California based organic CBD company. He joins Rena Sherbill to discuss the present confusion in the THC, CBD and vaping markets and the high margins that currently exist in the CBD market. They also cover what it takes for successful packaging and branding, the importance of clean products and the global CBD market. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
